posts.post_content: It's cool if you have something to destroy enchantments and with treefolk thats bound to happen. However the fact that this is not a treefolk card and that it limits your spells does bite. Maybe if you play this with the saproling to have it help you draw, but even then this was not one of Colfenors better plans.
